DOC.brief_title: A Safety Effectiveness Study Aroplatin Patients With Advanced Colorectal Cancer Resistant Standard Therapies
DOC.detailed_description: Primary Objective : - To determine response rate ( RR ; complete partial response [ CR , PR ] duration therapy Aroplatin ( Liposomal NDDP , L-NDDP ) subject locally recurrent , unresectable metastatic colorectal cancer refractory 5-FU/leucovorin capecitabine , irinotecan . Secondary Objective : - To determine safety tolerability Aroplatin therapy . This single-arm , open-label phase II study . Subjects refractory 5-FU/leucovorin capecitabine , irinotecan therapy enrol . Dosing every four week individual dose escalation adjustment toxicity .
